group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from the parents. The study was approved by the Ethics Committee of the First Affiliated Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University, Guangzhou, China, and performed in accordance with the principles enshrined in the Declaration of Helsinki.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for the publication of their clinical details and/or clinical images was obtained from the parents. A copy of the consent form is available for review by the Editor of this journal.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
